content: Cows fed on Brachiaria excrete much less methane, a greenhouse gas. And Cruz says by rotating pineapple and brachiaria grasses every 6 to 8 years, he has tripled the number of cows per hectare and eliminated the use of commercial fertilizers.
translations: ita:Le mucche nutrite con brachiaria espellono molto meno metano, un gas serra. E Cruz afferma che ruotando l'erba ananas e
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
